select detail.id, detail.detail_no, detail.bill_no, detail.ware_code, detail.area_code , detail.cell_code , detail.to_ware_code , detail.to_area_code , detail.to_cell_code , detail.item_code , detail.quantity, detail.memo , detail.state , detail.add_time , detail.task_time , detail.bill_type , detail.accept_quantity ,
detail.complete_quantity , detail.check_memo , detail.company_id , detail.batch, com.company_name, ware.ware_name , area.area_name , item.item_name, item.item_class, master.item_master_id,
(select ware_name from ware_info where ware_code = detail.to_ware_code ) as to_ware_name, (select area_name from area_info where area_code = detail.to_area_code ) as to_area_name
from bill_detail detail
left join area_info area on detail.area_code = area.area_code left join cell_info cell on detail.cell_code = cell.cell_code left join item_info item on detail.item_code = item.item_code left join bill_master master on detail.bill_no = master.bill_no left join ware_info ware on master.ware_code = ware.ware_code left join company com on master.company_id = com.company_id where TO_DAYS( NOW( ) ) - TO_DAYS(master.accept_time) = 1
and detail.item_code = #{itemCode} and master.ware_code = #{wareCode} and master.item_master_id = #{itemMasterId}
